This game is a literal masterpiece! The humor is clever, the graphics are quite good and the gameplay and characters are AMAZING! Top that with an amazing story and challenging tests and you have a really good game! The workshop maps are quite creative as well and this game just has it all! 10/10!

I played the first one, and the only criticism of that was the aiming mechanics through the portals, this was an excellent upgrade, the only thing I would add is more Turret types to encounter in game.  Even though this is a perfect ending for portal, I would love to see a Portal 3 to see what goes on outside and possibly what can be done with the Portal gun in a bigger environment. Since this shares a universe with Half-life, I can see the requiem of Half Life is the Defeat of the Combine and G-Man, with Portal 3 being a Bow to tie up the universe. When I do get to Half Life Episode 2 in a review I'll explain my ideas for the requiem and how Portal 3 could be an epilogue. Either way this was a very fun game to play, and hope to see its mechanics used in another game at some-point.

Portal 2 is one of my all-time favourite games. It perfectly balances fun gameplay, humor, puzzle-solving, and story. There is not much to criticize here. The sound design is pretty much perfect and the environment and atmosphere of the game is dark and drab, but it is perfectly orchestrated. The Perpetual Testing Initiative has given the gift of immortality to Portal and was probably the best thing Valve could do. This is definately one of the best games in the world and I would reccomend it to almost anyone.

I've played the pc and ps3 versions of this game more times than I can count, yet never get bored. Super fun to play both official and fan-made levels. Absolutely love Wheatly. A loveable ally that you get to annoy the absolute hell out of is a personal favorite of mine.

У Габена явно с юмором всё хорошо. Игра намного длиннее и веселее первой части. Один из тех моментов, когда сиквел лучше оригинала. В игру завезли множество новых механик, а не только порталы синий и оранжевый как в первой части. Сюжет стал более проработанный, с неожиданными поворотами и тем самым кубом, уничтоженным в первой части. Кому понравилась 1 часть, то обязательно пройдите вторую.

Solo : La patate, ayant un rôle plus qu'important dans l'intrigue est le seul défaut de ce jeu. En effet, ses courbes parfaites et sa douce voix me font chavirer d'excitation à chaque minute de jeu. Je ne tiens plus. Sinon le jeu est bien.
Coop : Vous avez des amis, et cela est un problème pour vous ? Valve à LA solution : Ce mode coop vous permettra de ruiner toute relation que vous auriez pu avoir avec ces amis en un rien de temps. il va donc sans dire que je recommande vivement ce mode de jeu, ayant un goût prononcé pour le prout.

A sequel to the classic puzzler Portal, Portal 2 takes you into the future, after [PORTAL 1 ENDING] happened. Solve new puzzles, with new mechanics, in new areas of the facility. Take part in a much more existent story and fight to escape Aperture once and for all.
Uno de los mejores juegos de la historia, punto.
